post.author: 김유나
post.content:
회사정보
회사명 Intellimail

주소 Canada Ontario  
  86A Northline Road Toronto M4B 3E5

홈페이지 www.mailpartners.com

회사소개 Intellimail is a total solution provider of corporate information management, data processing and business communications.


채용정보
직종 전산직  

직무 Data analyst - informatics and systems

고용형태 Permanent, Full Time  

모집기간  Start Date: 2003/02/01

급여 To be negotiated

근무지 Canada   Ontario Toronto East  


지원자격
학력 Completion of high school  

자격증  

경력 1 - 2 years

필요한기술 Programming Languages: HTML, Java Script, Object-Oriented programming languages, Visual Basic
Applications: Adobe Acrobat Reader, Flash, MS Excel, MS Office, MS Word, Shockwave
Management Systems (erp or db): Dbase, MS Access, MS Visual FoxPro
Communication Protocols: TCP/IP
Other: Network security


기타 Looking to fill a junior level position with an individual who posesses computer skills, initiative and a willingness to learn. As a small business we are seeking a candidate who can excel not just in programming but also at a variety of tasks. An ability to coordinate and oversea projects is important as well as the potential for growth. Work experience is preferred as is a knowledge and understanding of Direct Mail.


지원방법
지원방법 By Mail/By Fax/By E-mail  

담당자  

전화 -- -- -  

팩스번호 416- 759- 3459  

이메일 david@mailpartners.com
post.title: Data analyst - informatics and systems
